description:
Words Puzzles 3 in 1 brings you three word puzzle games in one game.  Word search is a word puzzle game like a crossword riddle where you have to find words in a square of letters.
Word connect is a word puzzle game where you have to fill in words in a grid by connecting given letters in the right combination.
Word Blocks is a word puzzle game where you have to find words by connecting letterblocks into words and if the word is the searched ine the blocks vanish which opens new connecting possiblities.
Three word puzzle whith dozens of puzzles where you can find your favorite word puzzle game.

Features:
- Three variations of word puzzle games
- Dozens of puzzles for each variation
- Different difficulties from beginner to expert
name: Words Puzzles 3 in 1
